title: Society and Mental Health - Vicarious Experiences of Major Discrimination and Psychological Distress among Black Men and Women
itunes:title: Society and Mental Health - Vicarious Experiences of Major Discrimination and Psychological Distress among Black Men and Women
description: Author Myles D. Moody, Courtney S. Thomas Tobin, and Christy L. Erving discuss their article, "Vicarious Experiences of Major Discrimination and Psychological Distress among Black Men and Women," published in the November 2022 issue of Society and Mental Health.
content:encoded: Author Myles D. Moody, Courtney S. Thomas Tobin, and Christy L. Erving discuss their article, "Vicarious Experiences of Major Discrimination and Psychological Distress among Black Men and Women," published in the November 2022 issue of Society and Mental Health.
